item: (to be completed by contractor or his authorized representatives)
item_zh: （由承建商或其授權代表填寫）

item: Period of the Permit
item_zh: 許可證期限

session: Date of entry to the Confined Space
session_zh: 進入密閉空間的日期及時間
許可證的到期日及時間

session: Total Certified workers assigned to this work
session_zh: 獲指派工作的核准工人數

item.session_zh: 密閉空間培訓證書編號

session: Certified workers assigned to this work
session_zh: 獲指派工作的核准工人

item.session_zh: 密閉空間培訓證書編號

session: Standby person(s) assigned to this work
session_zh: 獲指派工作的候命人員

item.session_zh: 密閉空間培訓證書編號

session_zh: 進行風險評估的合資格人士

item: (to be completed by the Competent Person)
item_zh: （由合資格人士填寫）

session_zh: 其他可預見 / 已識別的危害

session: Normal service in the confined space suspended
session_zh: 停止密閉空間內的日常運作

session: All inlets and outlets isolated / blanked off
session_zh: 隔離或封閉所有出入口位

session: All power isolated (electrical / mechanical / hydraulic / others)
session_zh: 隔離所有動力（電氣 / 機動 / 油壓 / 其它）
隔離其它有危險的來源

item: (Different levels and locations)
item_zh: （不同水平及位置）

item: Oxygen (between 19.5% and 23%)
Combustible gases (not>10% of LEL)
item_zh: 可燃氣體（不可大於 10% LEL）

session_zh: 大氣測試 - 可燃氣體

item: Carbon Monoxide (not >25ppm)
item_zh: 一氧化碳（不可大於 25ppm）

session_zh: 大氣測試 - 一氧化碳

item: Hydrogen Sulfide (not >10ppm)
item_zh: 硫化氫（不可大於 10ppm）

item: Other
item_zh: 其他

session: 頭、手、腳部防護 Head, Hand & Foot Protection
救生繩及吊帶 Life Lines & Harness

session_zh: G 其他安全預防措施

caption: (equipment and methods)
session: Communications between certified workers and standby person
session_zh: 核准工人與候命人員之聯絡

item: I have personally carried out a risk assessment specific to the scope of work being undertaken and the working condition within the confined space.
item_zh: 我已親自對密閉空間內所工作的性質和環境進行了風險評估。

item:
In the risk assessment, I have made specific recommendations on the adopted measures to ensure the health
& safety of all persons entering in or working within the confined space.
item_zh: 風險評估中，我已就需要採取的措施提出具體建議，以確保進入或在密閉空間內工作的所有人員之健康與安全。

item: I have attached a copy of the risk assessment to this Permit-To-Work.
item_zh: 我已將風險評估報告的副本附在此工作許可證上。

item: I have explained to workers and standby persons assigned to this work about all safety measures or precautions and will ensure all the assigned workers to properly use the recommended PPE specified in the risk assessment.
item_zh: 我已向參與本工作的工人及候命人員講解需要採取的一切安全措施或預防措施，並將確保所有獲指派的工人按照風險評估所列的建議適當地使用個人防護裝備。

item: (to be completed by main contractor or his authorized representatives)
item_zh: (由總承建商或其授權代表填寫)

item: I certify that I have personally checked all the above conditions and acknowledge that all the above particulars are accurate or have been implemented. I certify that:
item_zh: 本人證明已親自核對上述所有情況，並確認上述情況是準確的或已實施。我證明：

session: Part 1 and 2 have been properly completed.
session_zh: 第 1 及 2 部分已適當完成。

item.title: The confined space is safe for entry without breathing apparatus.
item.title_zh: 進入密閉空間不須配帶呼吸器具

item.title: To enter the confined space, approved breathing apparatus must be worn.
item.title_zh: 進入密閉空間，必須配帶認可的呼吸器具

item.title: No foreseeable changes in the environment during the work, monitoring is required.
item.title_zh: 預計工作期間環境不會發生變化，不須監察。

session: The necessary safety precautions for entering into the confined space are:
session_zh: 進入密閉空間需要採取以下安全預防措施：

session: Date & Time of Expiry of the Certificate

session_zh: 所有工人均為核准工人。

item: (to be completed by subcontractor / person-in-charge of the work)
item_zh: (由分判或工程負責人填寫)
session_zh: 第四部份：簽收工作許可證

item: I have read and understood the description of this Permit-To-Work and shall undertake to work in accordance with all the conditions laid down in it.
item_zh: 本人已閱讀及明白此工作許可證內容，並承諾會根據許可證內的指示工作。

session: Part 5: Extension of Time of Permit-To-Work
session_zh: 第五部分：延長許可證的有效期

item: The work has not been completed as scheduled and permission to continue is requested.
item_zh: 限時內未能完成工作，要求延長工作時間。
session: Request for Extension of Time of the Permit
session_zh: 要求延長許可證有效時間

item.session_zh: 要求延長許可證有效時間

session_zh: 要求延長許可證有效時間

item: (to be completed by contractor or his authorized representatives)
item_zh: (由承建商或其授權代表填寫)

item.item: I have re-assessed and re-examined the confined space detailed above, and confirm that this work permit can be
item.item_zh: 本人已重新查明和檢驗上述密閉空間，並証實此工作證可

item.session_zh: 進一步的安全預防措施

item: (to be completed by person-in-charge of the work)
item_zh: (由工程負責人填寫)

item: The work has been completed and all assigned persons, materials and equipment had been withdrawn.
item_zh: 工作已經完成，所有獲指派人士、物料和設備已撤離現場。

item: (to be completed by contractor or his authorized representatives)
item_zh: (由承建商或其授權代表填寫)

item: This Permit-To-Work is now cancelled; and A new Permit-To-Work will be required if work is to be continued.
item_zh: 現註銷此工作許可證；及如要繼續工作，須申領新工作許可證。
